data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ydwolOj4NN4Q7kNvgGk2quO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAnaZDkQ07kdyet2ujdtP9DLPI6eGEC2BPehC9KIZoOFg&oe=667FF09C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=J6GF32Zhir4Q7kNvgEwwZYZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCsm5Pzrr_EHGJcz7F8Ze-iH_D5-E5x7NnUrxbbbNp1og&oe=667FFA24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Mlip7qDSA4QQ7kNvgFsQqJD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDbfFvjWLylWFKm-SLIXU1UNZUy5dke0Gl7g7J3c3OVqQ&oe=667FE187)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DfqSa4U0CHwQ7kNvgEi6vV7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBCAKwrIju9HuYYkO823ydzwQP6oMZ0TBwn6ZKYY54P6w&oe=667FD466)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GqtQkrWZvscQ7kNvgFZVUrw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB6W5TANLcqAeJAghYl5vpDqac0d-m91HUC0SJZPPH5gA&oe=668000D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M72hV4mVhUUQ7kNvgHnyiau&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCcJtQQbcz3F89xFDwIzVL0ds0fCp-rwfFG9JmWye0lHA&oe=667FFD59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2dpeIvVvOw8Q7kNvgFN77a4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD9E9weZ2WhR60QUFTg9kqEsyaSQqdZcHKEtaNwLgRY4Q&oe=667FE370)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=h2aaTQueZx4Q7kNvgG3GGgH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC5SUdC7yY9_EVWatztGC7VE_fhMLrXXWyA-69Gin--Bw&oe=667FCDEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UJHH54g_MJ4Q7kNvgG-Hcdl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBolqzyeSeuNQXUOhrwNnIcU4mO4znwGldBxzY8BAFBJQ&oe=667FE197)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YS_kr6Dz_W8Q7kNvgFG_GKJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDYRTIO4erA3nfvlQfNEQ1O5B4BfqC5NxQWP5THXnQHTQ&oe=667FFD0C)
